Projects.title: About the project
Projects.intro: The Good Boy Foundation improves the lives of dogs in shelters in Slovakia. It focuses on healthcare, adoptions, temporary care, and promoting responsible pet ownership through education and community programs.
Projects.outro: Our work is possible thanks to the support of individuals, companies, and the community. We organize campaigns, fundraisers, and activities that help shelters provide better conditions for animals and increase chances of adoption.
